title: Truth and innocency defended being a sober reply to some excesses in a treatise written by John Norris, concerning the divine light, wherein his personal reflections and misrepresentations of the Quakers about their principle of the light are further considered.
author: Vickris, Richard, d. 1700.
publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Richard Vickris. cf. NUC Pre-1956.
Epistle to the reader signed: R.V.
